description.jp:
頑健な肉体を持つロンゾ族の青年で
幼き日よりユウナを守っているガード。
魔物の技を覚えて使いこなす。
ただ実直にユウナを守り
ユウナの意思を何よりも尊重する。
寡黙で心情を量りにくいが 折れたツノは
故郷を捨てた過去に深い関わりを持つ。
description.gl: A youth of the robust Ronso tribe and guardian of Yuna. Learns and uses monster abilities. Earnestly protects his summoner and holds her wishes in the highest regard. Stoic and of few words、 a deep connection exists between his broken horn and the home he abandoned.

jp.text: キマリも練習している
今度は勝つ\n勝つと決めた
キマリは驚いている\nおまえは優しい
キマリはおまえを許さない！\nロンゾの怒りが宿った槍で 討ち滅ぼす！！
キマリが先に行く\nユウナの前はキマリが守る

gl.text: This time、 I win. I will win!
Kimahri is surprised. Kimahri think you are kind.
You have angered Kimahri! The spirits of the Ronso will guide Kimahri's spear!
Kimahri goes first. Yuna is safe. Kimahri protect.

desc.en: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 近距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en:
Ranged BRV+HP attack
Moderately restores HP based on HP damage dealt, up to 20% of Max HP
Grants [Ronso's Trait] for 3 turns

While [Ronso's Trait] is active:
• [Lancet] becomes [Lancet & Thrust Kick]
　∟ Triggers another ranged BRV+HP attack at the end
• [HP Attack] becomes [Jump]
　∟ Ranged BRV+HP attack
　∟ Low Action Delay

[Ronso's Trait] has the following effects:
• Raises own Max BRV and Attack
• Raises party Defense
desc.gl:
Ranged BRV attack + HP attack
Moderately restores own HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 20% of own MAX HP
Self: 3 turns Ronso Traits
Becomes Lancet & Thrust Kick, HP Attack becomes Jump while Ronso Traits active
desc.jp:
遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
与えたHPダメージに応じて自身のHP中回復
回復量の上限は 自身の最大HPの20％分
自身に3ACTION「ロンゾの特性」付与
「ロンゾの特性」付与中
「竜剣＆回しげり」に
通常「HP攻撃」が「ジャンプ」に変化

desc.gl: Ronso Traits: Raises own MAX BRV, ATK; raises party's DEF (does not stack)

desc.en:
Raises party BRV based on Attack
Grants [HP Damage Reduction] to party for 3 turns

While [Ronso's Trait] is active:
• [Mighty Guard] becomes [Mighty Guard & Bad Breath]
　∟ Triggers an AoE ranged BRV+HP attack
　∟ HP damage dealt is split amongst all enemies
　∟ Inflicts [Bad Breath] for 3 turns

[Bad Breath] has the following effects:
• Lowers Max BRV and Attack
• Deals BRV damage every turn

When using [Lancet], [Lancet & Thrust Kick]:
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Slightly improves Max BRV and Attack Up effects of [Ronso Traits]
• Moderately improves party Defense Up effect of [Ronso Traits]

When using [Lancet]:
• Increases number of BRV hits by 3 (4-HIT ranged BRV attack + HP attack)
• Tremendously raises total BRV potency

When using [Lancet & Thrust Kick]:
• Increases number of BRV hits by 6 (4-HIT ranged BRV attack + HP attack delivered twice)
• Tremendously raises total BRV potency

While [Ronso Traits] is active, [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]:
• BRV attack hit count becomes 2
• Greatly raises total BRV potency

When using [Jump]:
• Raises BRV based on Attack before attacking
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
